Key Match Events: Jazz Chisholm Jr. hit a walk-off infield single in the 11th inning to score Jon Berti, giving the Yankees a 4-3 win over the Royals.
Post-Match Reflections: The Yankees moved 1 Â½ games clear of the Orioles in the AL East and took a series from the Royals.
Manager Aaron Boone praised the team's performance and the bullpen's effort.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees' offense was restrained until the sixth inning when Juan Soto hit a two-run homer.
Luke Weaver held down the Royals in the top of the 11th inning.
Anthony Volpe was thrown out at home in a double play attempt.
Clay Holmes allowed a run in the seventh inning.
